review: I bought two for my kids for Christmas...so far so good.  Easy set up and streams Netflix and Pandora with no problems.

review: I received this as a gift! So much easier to use than going through a Wii.  Easy hookup.

review: Great! I wish I could use it in Harrisburg Pa. without a cable connection.

review: Just got it. Easy to install and start viewing. Hopefully, I will have time to get into all of its functions. So far I am pleased with the ease of use.
author: frank

review: Great if You have Amazon prime and netflix. Was Hoping yo see You tube or stream From our pc.

review: I love it !! Small takes up no space.

review: Love the Fire Stick!  It's so easy yo setup and use!

review: Love it, but I was really expecting a whole lot more variety with Prime Instant Video.
